acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill recursive POJOs correctly, including all their fields
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillRecursivePojos

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then all the POJOs in the recursive hierarchy should be valid
